results.content: Despite the Indian-English language it is full of practical information . There is no hesitation to tackle the stuff .

results.content: I am more than happy with this course.  It is to the point and not full of filler and fluff.  The instructor is crystal clear with the content and never wanders from the task at hand. Keep up the great work!!
results.content_html: I am more than happy with this course. It is to the point and not full of filler and fluff. The instructor is crystal clear with the content and never wanders from the task at hand. Keep up the great work!!

results.content: This is a supplementary course for “jQuery from scratch (jfs)” which cover topics that are either left out or in more detail in jfs. However, it would be nice if this course includes the ajax topic.
results.content_html: This is a supplementary course for “jQuery from scratch (jfs)” which cover topics that are either left out or in more detail in jfs. However, it would be nice if this course includes the ajax topic.
